## MULTI\_BUTTON\_CSS\_CLASSES variable

Injection token for default css classes for multibutton

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
MULTI_BUTTON_CSS_CLASSES: InjectionToken<MultiButtonCssClasses>
```
